# bds-text



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                                    | Type                                                 | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`          | `color`           | Escolha a cor do texto.                                                                        | `string`                                             | `'default'` |
| `fontStyle`      | `font-style`      | Added font style italic                                                                        | `"italic" \| "normal"`                               | `'normal'`  |
| `fontWeight`     | `font-weight`     | Bold. Entered as one of the bold. Can be one of: 'regular', 'semi-bold', 'bold', 'extra-bold'; | `"bold" \| "extra-bold" \| "regular" \| "semi-bold"` | `'regular'` |
| `href`           | `href`            | URL para quando a tag for 'a', se houver.                                                      | `string`                                             | `''`        |
| `tag`            | `tag`             | Define a tag HTML que ser√° usada (ex: 'p', 'span', 'h1', 'a', etc).                            | `string`                                             | `'p'`       |
| `textAlign`      | `text-align`      | Adiciona text align do css para textos.                                                        | `"center" \| "justify" \| "left" \| "right"`         | `null`      |
| `textDecoration` | `text-decoration` | Adiciona text decoration do css para textos.                                                   | `"line-through" \| "underline"`                      | `null`      |
| `textOverflow`   | `text-overflow`   | Adiciona text align do css para textos.                                                        | `boolean`                                            | `false`     |
